songs.title: Bloody Shirt (Bastille Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooooo-oo-oo
Ooooo-oo-oo
Ooooo-oo-oo
Ooooo-oo-oo
(Get out, get out, get gone!)
(Get out, get out, get gone!)
Get out, get gone!
Heart is beating heavily
Get out, get gone!
Blood on your shirt

[Verse 1]
What you want to do tonight?
I've got wounds to lick in life
Oh you've said
Standing like a stick
This tie could invert and be a noose instead

[Post-Verse]
Oh you lie next to me
Heart is beating heavily
There's blood in your ear though
Blood on your shirt

[Pre-Chorus]
It's too late to say you're sorry
Say you're sorry still
I stepped out with heavy heart
To bail you out again
Oh those things you do
Oh those things you do

[Chorus]
Get out, get gone!
This town is only gonna get worse
Get out, get gone!
This town is only gonna eat you

[Verse 2]
Oh so many bills to pay
No this debt won't go away
Oh so sad
What you know you're drunk again
Take it out on your best friend
Oh so sad

[Post-Verse]
Oh you lie next to me
Heart is beating heavily
There's blood in your ear though
Blood on your shirt

[Pre-Chorus]
It's too late to say you're sorry
Say you're sorry still
I stepped out with heavy heart
To bail you out again
Oh those things you do
Oh those things you do

[Chorus] x2
Get out, get gone!
This town is only gonna get worse
Get out, get gone!
This town is only gonna eat you

[Post-Verse]
Oh you lie next to me
Heart is beating heavily
There's blood in your ear though
Blood on your shirt

[Pre-Chorus]
It's too late to say you're sorry
Say you're sorry still
I stepped out with heavy heart
To bail you out again
Oh those things you do
Oh those things you do

(Get out, get out, get gone!) x4
Blood on your shirt

[Chorus]
Get out, get gone!
This town is only gonna get worse
Get out!
Get gone
This town is only gonna eat you
This town is only gonna east you
This town is only gonna eat you
